items.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two longsword attacks or two fist attacks.

items.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature against which the knight has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage.
